Sentencas: In order to enhance the electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), La2Ni1-xCuxO4+delta (x = 0, 0.01, 0.02, 0.05 and 0.1) doped with copper in percentages, varying between 1% and 10%, were prepared following the modified Pechini method.
Titulo: Synthesis, structural analysis and electrochemical performance of low-copper content La2Ni1-xCuxO4+δ materials as new cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructure and morphology of the samples were analyzed by XRD and SEM.
Titulo: Synthesis, structural analysis and electrochemical performance of low-copper content La2Ni1-xCuxO4+δ materials as new cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance was followed by impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Synthesis, structural analysis and electrochemical performance of low-copper content La2Ni1-xCuxO4+δ materials as new cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: La2Ni0.99Cu0.01O4+delta samples showed good electrochemical and physicochemical properties with respect to the undoped material and is potentially a promising cathode.
Titulo: Synthesis, structural analysis and electrochemical performance of low-copper content La2Ni1-xCuxO4+δ materials as new cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Indeed, doping with such small amounts of copper (1%) into the nickel site led to the formation of pure phases and stabilized the material before and after use at high temperature under air.
Titulo: Synthesis, structural analysis and electrochemical performance of low-copper content La2Ni1-xCuxO4+δ materials as new cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In contrast, doping with higher amounts of copper (2%, 5% and 10%) led, after heating at 1000 degrees C for 48 h, to the formation of another phase resulting from the diffusion of copper into the YSZ electrolyte, limiting the interest to these materials as SOFC cathodes.
Titulo: Synthesis, structural analysis and electrochemical performance of low-copper content La2Ni1-xCuxO4+δ materials as new cathodes for solid oxide fuel cells
